page.title: 18HALE FETE_A PUPIL'S ACCOUNT
page.content: EVERY YEAR IN JUNE OUR SCHOOL HAS A FETE ON THE VILLAGE GREEN. THIS YEAR IT WAS A "PINK FETE" AND IT WAS OPENED BY ONE OF OUR DADS DRESSED AS THE PINK PANTHER. HE CAME IN A CAR WITH PINK BALLOONS ON AND ALL THE LADIES AND GIRLS WERE WEARING PINK CLOTHES AND THE BAND WAS PLAYING. THE THING I LIKED BEST WAS THE BOUNCY CASTLE. IT WAS INFLATED BY AN ELECTRIC PUMP AND THEN THE CHILDREN COULD GO AND JUMP ABOUT ON IT FOR 20p. AFTER I'D BEEN ON THAT I WENT TO THE MAKE-UP STALL AND HAD MY HAIR SPRAYED RED AND BLUE.THAT WAS 25p. THEN I WENT AND BOUGHT A HOT JACKET POTATO WITH CHEESE FILLING AND THAT COST ME 80p. THERE WERE COMPETITIONS TOO.I ENTERED THE PHOTO COMPETITION AND ALSO THE ONE FOR THE CRAZIEST HAT BUT I DIDN'T WIN. THE PROFIT FROM THE FETE WAS Â£200.
